projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description:
🌐 Personal Portfolio Website

This portfolio website is a digital representation of my skills, creativity, and passion for web development. Crafted using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it delivers a clean, fully responsive design that adapts seamlessly across all screen sizes.

The site offers an intuitive interface that highlights my journey as a developer. It features:

  • 👤 About Me – A brief introduction to who I am and what I do
  • 📁 Project Gallery – A showcase of selected projects with detailed descriptions and technologies used
  • 🛠️ Skills Section – Highlights of my core technical proficiencies
  • 🎯 Interests – Personal interests that shape my approach and curiosity

Designed as both a personal brand and a communication platform, this website helps me connect with clients, collaborators, and potential employers. It serves as a centralized space to explore my work, learn more about me, and reach out for opportunities.

projects.title: MoviePerDay
projects.description:
🎬 Movie Description & Recommendation System

This is a dynamic, feature-rich movie recommendation and description platform built using Django. It is designed to offer users a personalized and interactive experience while exploring, managing, and sharing movie content.

👤 User Profiles & Personalization

Users can create and manage their profiles with options beyond just personal data. Each profile is connected to personalized movie preferences, enabling a highly tailored user experience. Users can:

  • 📋 Create personal watchlists
  • ❤️ Add movies to "Liked", "Watch Later ⏳", and "Watched ✅" lists
  • 🔗 Share their collections and favorites with friends or the public

🔍 Advanced Search & Filtering

The platform includes an intelligent search engine and filtering system. Users can effortlessly explore thousands of movies with sorting options based on:

🎥 Detailed Movie Pages

Each movie has a comprehensive detail page, including:

  • 📖 Movie summary and storyline
  • 🎭 Cast and crew
  • ⭐ Ratings and reviews
  • 🎬 Official trailers
  • 🔄 Related movie suggestions based on viewing history

🤝 Recommendation Engine

One of the core features of the platform is its recommendation system. Based on the user's watch history, likes, and saved lists, the system suggests movies tailored to their taste. This makes discovering new content more intuitive and enjoyable.

📱 Fully Responsive Design

The entire system is built with a mobile-first approach, ensuring seamless performance across all devices — from desktops to smartphones. The UI is clean, minimal, and user-friendly to deliver a smooth browsing experience.

Key Features: Profile Management | Smart Recommendations | Watchlists | Social Sharing | Responsive UI | Trailer Integration

projects.title: Bingo
projects.description:
🎲 Real-Time Bingo Game

This is a real-time, interactive Bingo game built using Flask and Socket.IO that allows users to enjoy both solo and multiplayer modes in a smooth, responsive web environment.

🧠 Game Modes

  • 🧍‍♂️ Play with Computer – Instant single-player mode for practice or fun
  • 👥 Play with Friends – Create a private game room and invite others to join
  • 🔗 Join Existing Rooms – Enter a room code to start playing with others

💬 In-Game Chat

Each game room includes a built-in chat system powered by WebSockets, enabling players to communicate in real time during the match — making gameplay more social and engaging.

🎨 UI & Experience

The game features a visually appealing, user-friendly interface designed with a focus on clarity, responsiveness, and fun. The layout adapts smoothly across devices, providing an equally exciting experience on both desktop and mobile.

🔧 Real-Time Engine

The game leverages Socket.IO to manage live interactions — from number calling to card marking and chat messaging — all with low latency and high stability.

Tech Stack: Flask | Python | Socket.IO | HTML | CSS | JavaScript
Key Features: Multiplayer Rooms | Real-Time Play | Chat System | Responsive UI | Play vs Computer

projects.title: GameZone
projects.description:
🎮 Game Zone Management System

The Game Zone Management System is a centralized web application designed to bring multiple gaming clubs under a single, streamlined platform. Built to simplify slot booking, payments, and administration, the system offers a modern solution for both users and club owners.

👤 User Features

  • 📝 Create and manage personal accounts
  • 💰 Recharge wallet and use it for booking game slots
  • 🎯 Book slots based on interest, game type, and availability
  • 📅 View, track, and manage all bookings from the dashboard
  • ⚙️ Update profile, manage preferences, and transaction history

🏢 Club Manager Features

Each club manager has their own dashboard to handle operations within their game zone. They can:

  • 📋 Manage slot availability and pricing
  • 📊 View bookings and customer activity in real time
  • 🔄 Approve, cancel, or reschedule bookings

🛠️ Admin Features

The admin panel allows centralized control over the entire system. Admins can:

  • 🔐 Manage users, clubs, and managers
  • 📈 Monitor system-wide analytics and performance
  • ⚙️ Handle finances, recharge history, and resolve issues

This system aims to digitize and simplify the game zone experience, making it faster, more convenient, and transparent for everyone involved.


Key Features: User Wallets | Slot Booking | Club Management | Admin Dashboard | Responsive UI

projects.title: SweetShop
projects.description:
🍬 SweetShop - Online Sweet Store

SweetShop is a complete eCommerce platform specializing in traditional and modern sweets, built with modern web technologies to provide a seamless shopping experience for customers and powerful management tools for administrators.

🛒 Customer Features

  • 🍭 Product Catalog - Browse sweets by category, occasion, or dietary needs
  • 🔍 Advanced Search - Find specific sweets with filters and keywords
  • 🛒 Cart System - Add multiple items, modify quantities before checkout
  • 💳 Secure Payments - Multiple payment gateway integration
  • 📦 Order Tracking - Real-time updates from kitchen to delivery

👨‍🍳 Vendor Features

  • 📊 Inventory Management - Track stock levels and get low-stock alerts
  • 📝 Product Management - Add/update sweet items with images and descriptions
  • 📈 Sales Reports - View daily/weekly/monthly sales analytics

👑 Admin Panel

  • 👥 User Management - Manage customers, vendors, and staff accounts
  • 💰 Order Management - Process, cancel, or refund orders
  • 📢 Promotions - Create discount codes and special offers
  • 📝 Content Management - Update homepage banners and featured items

The platform features a responsive design that works perfectly on all devices, ensuring customers can satisfy their sweet cravings anytime, anywhere.

Key Features: Online Payments | Inventory Management | User Dashboard | Admin Panel

projects.title: ExpensesSplitter
projects.description:
💰 ExpenseSplitter - Smart Group Expense Manager

ExpenseSplitter is a collaborative expense management system that simplifies splitting costs among friends, roommates, or travel companions. The platform makes group finances transparent and hassle-free.

👥 Group Management

  • ➕ Create Groups - For trips, households, or any shared expenses
  • 👥 Invite Members - Registered users or guests via email/link
  • 👑 Admin Controls - Group creator manages members and permissions

💸 Expense Tracking

  • 📝 Add Expenses - With descriptions, amounts, and categories
  • 👥 Split Flexibly - Equal or custom splits among members
  • 📷 Receipt Upload - Optional photo attachments for proof

🧮 Settlement System

  • 📊 Auto Calculations - See who owes whom and how much
  • ✅ Mark as Paid - Track settled amounts
  • 📈 History - View all past transactions and settlements

📱 User Experience

  • 🎯 Guest Access - Participate without full registration
  • 📱 Mobile-First - Optimized for smartphones and tablets

The system eliminates the "I'll pay you back later" hassle by keeping everyone on the same page with clear, real-time expense tracking.

Key Features: Group Expense Management | Guest Access | Smart Settlements | Receipt Tracking | Mobile Optimized

projects.title: DataScraper
projects.description:
🕷️ Amazon Data Scraper

A Django-based web scraping tool that extracts product data from Amazon using either product URLs or ASINs. The system automatically stores scraped information in a database for analysis and later use.

🔧 Core Functionality

  • 🌐 Dual Input - Accepts both product URLs and Amazon Standard Identification Numbers (ASINs)
  • ⚡ Automated Scraping - Uses Selenium for dynamic content and BeautifulSoup for parsing
  • 📦 Data Extraction - Captures title, price, ratings, reviews, description, and seller information

💾 Data Management

  • 🗃️ Database Storage - Organizes scraped data in structured tables
  • ⏱️ Timestamp Tracking - Records when each product was scraped
  • 🔄 Update Capability - Rescrapes to refresh product data

The system includes a simple web interface for submitting requests and viewing collected data, with options to export results in CSV or JSON format.

Tech Stack: Django | Selenium | BeautifulSoup | PostgreSQL
Key Features: URL/ASIN Input | Price Tracking | Review Extraction | Anti-Bot Measures | Data Export

projects.title: MovieRecommender
projects.description:
🎬 MovieMatch: Content-Based Recommender

A lightweight recommendation engine that suggests films based on content similarity, trained on IMDb's 5000-movie dataset with metadata including genres, keywords, cast, and crew.

🔍 Recommendation Logic

  • 🎞️ Content-Based Filtering - Uses movie metadata for similarity matching
  • 📊 TF-IDF Vectorization - Processes text features (genres/keywords)
  • 📐 Cosine Similarity - Measures similarity between movie profiles

📂 Dataset Features

  • 🏷️ 5,000 Movies - From IMDb with complete metadata
  • 📝 Rich Attributes - Genres, directors, actors, plot keywords

🖥️ User Interface

  • 🔎 Search Function - Find movies by title
  • 📱 Responsive Design - Works on all devices

ML Components: TF-IDF | Cosine Similarity | Metadata Processing
